translations: 1. 认为，估计：对某事物进行判断或评估。
· He reckons that the price will go up.
2. 计算，数：计算或确定数量。
· She reckons the total cost to be around $500.
她估计总成本在500美元左右。

phrs.translation: 处理；对付；和…算帐；预料到

sentences.sentence: Extrapolating from his latest findings, he reckons about 80% of these deaths might be attributed to smoking.
sentences.translation: 从他最近的发现推断，他估计大约80%的这类死亡可能归因于吸烟。

sentences.sentence: An advertising agency reckons it will be worth about $138 million this year.
sentences.translation: 一家广告公司估计，今年它的价值约为1.38亿美元。

sentences.sentence: Magna, an advertising agency, reckons it will be worth about $138 million this year.
sentences.translation: 麦格纳广告代理公司估计，今年它的价值约为1.38亿美元。
